name: Mike Nazaruk
introduction: Mike Nazaruk (born October 2, 1921 in Newark, New Jersey  died May 1, 1955 in Langhorne, Pennsylvania) was a United States driver who competed in three Indianapolis 500 events when it was in the Formula One calendar. His best finish was second in the 1951 race. Nazaruk was killed in a sprint car race just before practice was to start for the 1955 Indianapolis 500.
